message: About This Game A rogue-lite river journey through the backwaters of a forgotten post-societal America. Forage, craft, evade predators. For PC, Mac, and Xbox One.  From the Art Director of BioShock and a team of veterans of the BioShock, Halo, Guitar Hero and Rock Band series comes The Flame in the Flood.  Travel by foot and by raft down a procedurally-generated river as you scrounge for resources, craft tools, remedy afflictions, evade the vicious wildlife, and most importantly, stay ahead of the coming rains.  System Requirements Windows Mac OS X MINIMUM:  OS: Windows 7 64 bit (requires 64 bit OS)  Processor: Dual Core Processor, 2.5 GHz or higher  Memory: 4 GB RAM  Graphics: DX11 compatible video card  DirectX: Version 11  Storage: 2 GB available space  Additional Notes: These requirements are subject to change as we complete development  Review Metacritic: 76 Metascore Steam: Very Positive GameSpot: 8/10 Gameplanet: 8,5/10 GameRevolution: 2,5/5 CogConnected: 72/100   Launch trailer  Let's play   Price 16,47€ Is there any deal
Pozna kdo kake podobne bende kot tisti v trailerju?

@assistant_0 je 26. feb 2016 ob 22:20 izjavil:Pozna kdo kake podobne bende kot tisti v trailerju?   Glasbo je napisal Chuck Ragan, ki je (meni) najbolj znan kot kitarist/vokalist skupine Hot Water Music, ima pa za sabo tudi nekaj solo albumov, pretezno country-ish glasbe. Za nekaj podobnega bi oznacil tudi Jona Snodgrassa (tudi prispeva guest vokale na Flame in the Flood OST, ceprav uncredited), ki je kitarist/vokalist skupine Armchait Martian in verjetno zate bolj zanimive country-ish skupine Drag the River.  TL;DR: Youtube Chuck Ragan, Jon Snodgrass in Drag the River.
Kolk je pa to težka igra? Kakor berem drugje lahko kar hitro umreš...
Eni pravijo, da ni tako težka, drugi spet drugače in da je kar luck based.
Probal včeraj, je kr težka. Zaenkrat mi največ preglavic delajo volkovi.
Hm, potem to ni zame. Nimam ne časa in ne volje velik umirat v igri... imam preveč drugih stvari za igrat.  Čeprav mi je pa drugače tole ful všeč...
